title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Experience the classic game of Tic Tac Toe in a sleek and modern interface. Challenge your friends in this timeless battle of X and O.

title: Flappy Bird
description: Fly through a maze of obstacles in this addictive and challenging game. With simple controls and retro-inspired graphics, Flappy Bird will keep you hooked for hours as you strive to beat your high score.

title: Pac-Man
description: Join the iconic yellow character on a journey through mazes filled with ghosts and power-ups. Navigate through twists and turns, gobble up pellets, and avoid the ghosts to emerge victorious in this arcade classic.

title: Paint
description: Unleash your creativity with our Paint game! Express yourself through vibrant colours and endless possibilities. Whether you're a seasoned artist or just starting, Paint offers a canvas for you to create masterpieces, doodle freely, or simply have fun experimenting with different tools and brushes.

title: Minesweeper
description: Test your strategy and luck in this thrilling puzzle game, where your objective is to clear the grid without triggering hidden bombs. Use logic and hints to navigate through the minefield, uncover safe tiles, and beat your best time!

title: Piano
description: Piano Game is a fun music game that lets you adjust volume and play the piano directly using your keyboard. Unleash your creativity and enjoy music your way!

title: Chess
description: Engage in a traditional chess game designed for two players. With a simple, minimalist interface and smooth gameplay, this platform provides the perfect space for friendly matches and strategic battles.

title: Galactic Blasters
description: This game is an exciting adventure where you pilot a spaceship in outer space, battling against dangerous alien monsters. Your mission is to dodge obstacles, eliminate enemies, protect the galaxy, and achieve the highest score! Get ready for an intense journey among the stars.
